name: RespiratoryAssistDevice
title: Respiratory Assist Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Respiratory assist devices, with and without backup rate.),(Data Element Scope: Respiratory assist devices specified by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.),(Inclusion Criteria: Respiratory assist devices, with and without backup rate.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Respiratory assist device, bi-level pressure capability, without backup rate feature, used with noninvasive interface, e.g., nasal or facial mask (intermittent assist device with continuous positive airway pressure device)

Respiratory assist device, bi-level pressure capability, with back-up rate feature, used with noninvasive interface, e.g., nasal or facial mask (intermittent assist device with continuous positive airway pressure device)

contains.display: Respiratory assist device, bi-level pressure capability, without backup rate feature, used with noninvasive interface, e.g., nasal or facial mask (intermittent assist device with continuous positive airway pressure device)
